title: “Account stolen”
body:
Hello, dear Sir, I have recently had a problem, I can't enter my game! Yesterday, morning, I played the last of the game! And then I went to sleep, and after I wake up, the game was not going, it was sad! You know I spend a lot of effort on this account, there are many skin in this account. I contact my friends, let her give you E-mail, illustrates the situation as my English is not good. I can provide a bank account with my account! The most unfortunate thing is that I forgot which E-mail account I registered with! These are the email addresses I often us

[REMOVED]

[REMOVED]

[REMOVED]

[REMOVED]

[REMOVED]

My username is [REMOVED], it is clearly the username is same to that I used before! After my friend contacted the service people, the answer was to change my email address, which is [REMOVED]. The latest E-mail is to help me as soon as possible But I haven't solved it yet! If you have more questions, I can give you more information I hope you can solve this problem as soon as possible. Thank you verymuch


this account is my friend. {{champion:103}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

You'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support to resolve this issue, we here on the boards are unable to assist with account specific inquiries.

Please avoid posting personal information publically on the boards as this opens you up to potential account compromise and/or unsolicited contact via email.
